name: Agent Provisioning
description: IronClaw provisions a new agent repo: creates standalone repo with workspace, Dockerfile, and workflows
process: Receive reference project URL and agent name via campaign parameters
Create new repo in tinyland-inc org (or use existing)
Push workspace bootstrap files (AGENT.md, IDENTITY.md, SOUL.md, HEARTBEAT.md, TOOLS.md, memory/MEMORY.md)
Push GHCR build workflow and reference-sync workflow
Register initial campaigns for the new agent
Report: new agent provisioned, GHCR build URL, next steps for Terraform config
